DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Immediate Versus Delayed Loading Dental Implants With Modified Surface
DOC.detailed_description: This study post-market randomize study whereby patient receive 1 4 implant place posterior maxilla mandible . The primary objective randomize open study evaluate performance immediate delay loading ( 4 week ) Straumann standard solid screw 4.1mm 4.8 mm diameter wide neck implant new surface . These implant support single crown 2 4 unit bridge restoration posterior maxilla mandible treatment evaluate immediate delayed load procedure one year post surgery . Patients allocate two group randomize immediate delayed load arm .
DOC.criteria: Males female must least 18 year age Have least one miss tooth position FDI 4 , 5 , 6 , 7 quadrant ( ADA position 2 , 3 , 4 , 5 ; 12 , 13 , 14 , 15 ; 20 , 21 , 22 , 23 ; 28 , 29 , 30 , 31 . ) Subjects desire implant support restoration on1 4 implant per quadrant The tooth/teeth position ( ) propose implant site must extract lose least 4 month date implantation fully heal Adequate bone quality quantity implant site permit insertion Straumann standard 4.1 mm diameter implant least 8 mm length without use concurrent bone augmentation technique . If bone available indicate Straumann standard 4.8 mm diameter implant wide neck least 8 mm length may use , i.e . implant insertion site must sufficient bone height implant encroach vital structure sufficient width minimum 1 mm bone lingual buccal bone remain The oppose dentition must natural teeth fixed crown bridge natural teeth implant . Removable prosthesis dentures oppose study implant allow Patients must commit study full duration . Presence condition require chronic routine prophylactic use antibiotic ( e.g. , history rheumatic heart disease , bacterial endocarditis , cardiac valvular anomaly , prosthetic joint replacement ) Medical condition require prolong use steroid History leukocyte dysfunction deficiency History bleed disorder History neoplastic disease require use chemotherapy History radiation therapy head neck Patients history renal failure Patients severe uncontrolled metabolic bone disorder Uncontrolled endocrine disorder Physical handicap would interfere ability perform adequate oral hygiene Use investigational drug device within 30 day period immediately prior implant surgery study day 0 Alcoholism drug abuse Patients infect HIV Patients smoke > 10 cigarette per day cigar equivalent , chew tobacco Conditions circumstance , opinion investigator , would prevent completion study participation interfere analysis study result , history noncompliance , unreliability Local inflammation , include untreated periodontitis Mucosal diseases erosive lichen planus History local irradiation therapy Presence osseous lesion Unhealed extraction site ( less 4 month post extraction teeth intend site ) Bone surgery ( bone graft , guide tissue regeneration technique bone enhancement ) prior implant placement unless perform 6 month prior implant placement site fully heal . Note : Minor bone enhancement use harvest bone implant site resorbable membrane allow time implant placement Patients require bone graft surgical site time surgery . Severe bruxing clench habit Persistent intraoral infection Lack primary stability one ( ) implant ( ) surgery .
